item.title: Slack bot using [Zapier + Redash + Google sheets + Slack]
item.description: What are we going to do? Creating a slack bot that will post a message on a specific channel at a certain time (say, 9 am) about the total number of orders placed on your website in the last 24 hours. Assumptions Using slack for communication, organization of your work. Know how to write DB queries, I will be using redash for writing queries. Know the basics of google sheets.
